videos.alt:
NecroTwister Gameplay Preview

A short demo of NecroTwister.

images.alt: First level of NecroTwiser, 4 tiles arranged in a grid. The player must rotate the grid to reach the diamond tile.
A more advanced level, with a variety of enemies and tiles each with their own unique mechanics..
A 3x3 level featuring 2 enemies and lava/ice tiles.
Miro board showing a variety of level design concepts iterated upon during planning.
Miro board of initial game design ideas for NecroTwister.
Unity screenshot of a level setup.
